FuncDef: This command configures the precision of the cyclic redundancy check (CRC).

ParaDef.Info: Uses 16 bit checksum for the associated port/channel.
Uses 32 bit checksum for the associated port/channel.

ExtraInfo: Default: crc 16 for non-ATM channel groups configured under DS-1, E-1 and for non-ATM E-3 and DS-3 channel/ports.crc 32 for ATM channel-groups configured under DS-1 and E-1, and for ATM E-3 and DS-3 channels/ports. The default cannot be changed.
